description.text: This spell functions as aggressive thundercloud, except it deals 6d6 points of electricity damage to any creature it strikes. The first creature damaged by the cloud is also stunned for 1 round (Fortitude negates); this is a sonic effect.

sections.Components: V, S, M/DF (a piece of a tree struck by lightning)
sections.Saving Throw: Reflex negates and Fortitude negates (see text)
